L

login(String, String) - Method in class Login.LoginOperation
Attempts to login by verifying the provided username and password.
login(String, String) - Method in interface Login.LoginService
Attempts to authenticate a user with the provided username and password.
login(String, String) - Method in class Login.LoginVerifier
This method must be implemented by concrete verifiers to perform their specific verification.
login(String, String) - Method in class Login.PasswordVerifier
Verifies the username and password against the stored users in the database.
login(String, String) - Method in class Login.UsernameVerifier
Verifies if the username exists in the stored user data.
Login - package Login
 
LoginOperation - Class in Login
This class implements the LoginService interface and serves as the core of the login operation using the decorator pattern.
LoginOperation(String) - Constructor for class Login.LoginOperation
Constructs a LoginOperation with a specified file path for the password verification.
LoginService - Interface in Login
Defines the behavior for login operations.
LoginVerifier - Class in Login
Abstract decorator class for login verification.
LoginVerifier(LoginService) - Constructor for class Login.LoginVerifier
Constructs a LoginVerifier that wraps another LoginService object.
